originalText.text: I always have a great experience with Mug dental. The office is very modern and clean. Dr. Daniel always works with my schedule and makes sure Iâ€™m happy with every procedure. We always talk things out thoroughly before starting. I wouldnâ€™t go anywhere else.

originalText.text: Dr. Mug is a professional, extremely knowledgeable yet friendly and caring Dentist/ injector with a big adorable beautiful smile! I have had bad Botox experience in the past by different injectors and Dr. Mug is by far the best, he always makes my visits comfortable and pain free, excellent service always with a great staff.  I start seeing results pretty quick about 1 - 2 days after my injections, he has the best Botox material solution hands down! Nice kept clean office as well. I will not consider going anywhere else.

originalText.text: Amazing service!!  The doctor provides clear and concise details regarding every procedure being done.  Not only that, but Dr. MUG and the entire staff are incredibly friendly, and go out of their way to make you feel comfortable.  That skill is not taught in medical school!!  The absolute best experience I've ever had where syringes are being poked in my face!! ðŸ™‚.  Honestly, a great experience.

originalText.text:
I was so nervous for my first appointment at the dentist. Itâ€™s Been about 4 years. I knew right away Dr Mug was going to be patient and understanding. We spent over an hour discussing my oral health where he took pictures and gave me a fantastic cleaning. There were areas to improve and he went over a treatment plan to help fix my bite. Amazing how he offers complimentary Botox and Juvederm for all patients!

Thanks Dr Mug

originalText.text: Needed a deep cleaning after years of ignoring a gum problem I have. Dr. "Mug" was very welcoming and reassuring we could fix the problem and he did! My teeth look and feel 1000% better! I will be going back for my routine maintenance and any other dental needs that may arise.
